mapper.insert: INSERT INTO anime ("id", "hash_id", "season_id", "title", "subtitle", "cover", "horizontal_picture", "link", "type", "area", "status", "evaluate", "pub_time", "is_started", "is_finish", "weekday", "created_by", "created_time", "last_modified_by", "last_modified_time", "deleted_by", "deleted_time", "is_deleted") VALUES (#{et.id}, #{et.hashId}, #{et.seasonId}, #{et.title}, #{et.subtitle}, #{et.cover}, #{et.horizontalPicture}, #{et.link}, #{et.type.code}, #{et.area.code}, #{et.status}, #{et.evaluate}, #{et.publish.pubTime}, #{et.publish.isStarted}, #{et.publish.isFinish}, #{et.publish.weekday}, #{et.createdBy}, #{et.createdTime}, null, null, null, null, 0)
